entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Garden Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:35 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.5°C

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
